reviewText: Just love this funny movie it has romance, its funny love the actor Jesus Ochoa. Music is beautiful...

This is a pleasant, predictable, chick film from Mexico about an over the hill couple who are tired of each other. The wife in particular has become a harpy. Add three daughters into the mixture. The parents have an affair, the husband loses his job, they get a divorce but ultimately reconcile towards the end for a happy ending.

The parents have an affair, the husband loses his job, they get a divorce but ultimately reconcile towards the end for a happy ending.
Very well made movie. Witty and funny as could be:great acting and editing. When there is love sanity eventually wins.
Best comedy movie . Though I am not Spanish but the English subtitles were perfect and the expressions of all the actors were simply great . Overall I enjoyed it very much . You should watch it. ..
Very smart, heartfelt comedy about a family in present day Mexico.  The characters were believable and the cast was great.  I give it four and a half stars.
Unlike some translated films, the humor was evident and did not get lost in the translation.  Fun, warm comedy.
I found this modern day comedy heartwarming and realistic. The characters were realistic and the movie was well acted.
